name: Bitcoin Gold
short_description: Bitcoin Gold is a Hard Fork of Bitcoin. BTG implements a new PoW algorithm, Equihash, that makes mining decentralized again with ASIC resistant algorithm.
description: Bitcoin Gold (BTG) is a fork of Bitcoin that occurred on October 24, 2017 on block 419406. Bitcoin Gold changed Bitcoinâ€™s proof-of-work algorithm from SHA256 to Equihash rendering specialised mining equipment obsolete in an attempt to democratise the Bitcoin mining process.
